channel.title: NSQ on zylhorse blog
channel.description: Recent content in NSQ on zylhorse blog

item.title: Docker部署和配置nsqbeat
item.description: ############################# Nsqbeat ###################################### nsqbeat: # A list of NSQ Lookup Daemons to connect to lookupdhttpaddrs: ["192.168.20.99:4161"] # a Topic to sucscribe to topic: "logic.log" # The channel name to join channel: "nsqbeat" # How many in Flights maxinflight: 200 # If data in the topic is Json then use the decoder, if not set to something else like plain codec: "text" # use Golang time format layout to define if @timestamp exists and has a different format timelayout: "2006-01-02T15:04:05.

item.title: Docker部署和配置nsq集群
item.description: nsq.yml version: '3' services: nsqlookupd: image: nsqio/nsq command: /nsqlookupd ports: - 4160:4160 - 4161:4161 nsqd: image: nsqio/nsq command: /nsqd --lookupd-tcp-address=192.168.20.99:4160 --broadcast-address=192.168.20.99 depends_on: - nsqlookupd ports: - 4150:4150 - 4151:4151 nsqadmin: image: nsqio/nsq command: /nsqadmin --lookupd-http-address=192.168.20.99:4161 depends_on: - nsqlookupd ports: - 4171:4171

item.title: NSQ简介
item.description: 描述 是一个守护进程，负责接收，排队，投递消息给客户端 参数 -lookupd-tcp-address=: nslookup tcp 监听地址 -broadcast-address="": 注册到nslookup地址， 需要显示指定
